item.title: Report X-2023071042
item.description:
Report X-2023071042

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-13
  • City: WEST LEBANON
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023071042 SequenceEvent: The package was incorrectly loaded at the hub [stacked too high] and avalanched when unloaded at this facility. DescribePack: The package landed on its side and the cap leaked. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Trained personnel contained the spill and isolated the affected carton. 2. X-2023071043 SequenceEvent: The carton was improperly loaded at the hub [stacked too high] and avalanched when unloaded at this facility. DescribePack: The caps were compromised. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Trained personnel contained the spill and isolated the affected carton.
